hackathon.title: The first Celestia DeFi hackathon
hackathon.text: Compete to build the first wave of early DeFi products on Eden, Celestia’s new chain

elements.title: First to Eden
elements.text: Be among the first builders to launch on Celestia’s new DeFi hub

elements.title: Vault Republic
elements.subtitle: Strategies
elements.text: Build new financial superpowers for on-chain vaults, from insurance to simple options on vault performance, to permissionless index funds and credit lines.

items.title: Vault default swaps
items.text: Vault default swaps - insurance for vaults - pay a premium to guarantee your NAV won’t fall below a floor. Sellers earn premiums, buyers get peace of mind.

items.title: Vault options
items.text: Vault options - Options simplified for vault NAV. Buy puts to hedge, buy calls to speculate. Brings asymmetric payoff products to retail without the jargon.

items.title: Vault permissionless ETFs
items.text: Vault permissionless ETFs - ETF-style products tracking the top vaults. Eligibility rules: ≥ $10M TVL for 6 months, zkTLS-verified audits. Diversify in one click. Any vault can join automatically if they fulfil the criteria

items.title: Vault credit lines
items.text: Vault credit lines - Borrow against diversified vault/index tokens instead of single positions. Safer collateral, stable borrowing power.

items.title: Vault&Rich
items.text: Vault&Rich - On-chain S&P for vaults. Tracks TVL consistency, audit proofs, NAV volatility, and protocol history. Outputs ratings (AAA → junk). Vaults can use this metric to get included in the index fund.

items.title: No-code Vault builder
items.text: No-code Vault builder - Zapier for vaults. Drag-and-drop composition of VDS, Options, ETFs into custom structured products.

elements.title: Eat Gravel Rally
elements.subtitle: Socials
elements.text: Build social-native DeFi experiments: zk-gated vaults, chats, and token drops where conviction, activity, and community skin-in-the-game drive access and rewards.

elements.title: Treasury Trenches
elements.subtitle: Companies
elements.text: Build DAO finance tools, from fair-price payment executors and recurring payroll to on-chain receipts that bridge traditional invoices with crypto treasuries.

elements.title: Composition Meisters
elements.subtitle: Combinations
elements.text: The wildcard track - for hackers who want to remix, mutate, and mash-up ideas from all 3 tracks.
